document.full_text: a 16-year-old boy from rural colorado was arrested on friday for the shotgun killings of his great-grandparents, a crime that stunned residents of the small farming and ranching community where the couple lived for decades.
document.title: colorado boy arrested in murder of great-grandparents
lines_and_colors: a 16-year-old boy from rural colorado was arrested on friday for the shotgun killings of his great-grandparents, a crime that stunned residents of the small farming and ranching community where the couple lived for decades.
